alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 11:58AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 300 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1157 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Whitmore Wash, Parashant Wash, Sullivan Draw, Hurricane Wash, Agway Wash, Langs Run, Hobble Canyon, Ivanpatch Wash and Dutchman Draw. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central Mohave County - This includes the following roads... Mount Trumbull Loop Road between mile markers 15 and 51. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
